Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Insolito Villa in Santorini (Emporio), you'll be close to Panagia Episkopi and Red Beach. This 4-star villa is within close proximity of Prophet Elias Monastery and Boutari Winery.

Rooms
Treat yourself to a stay in one of the individually decorated guestrooms, featuring private pools and plasma televisions. Rooms have private furnished patios. Kitchens are outfitted with full-sized refrigerators/freezers, stovetops, and dishwashers. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment.

Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as tour/ticket assistance and barbecue grills.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include luggage storage and laundry facilities. Guests may use a ferry terminal shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2:00 PM Check-out time is noon

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Insolito Villa in Santorini (Emporio), you'll be close to Panagia Episkopi and Red Beach. This 4-star villa is within close proximity of Prophet Elias Monastery and Boutari Winery.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Panagia Episkopi - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Prophet Elias Monastery - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Boutari Winery - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Gavalas Vineyard - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Waterpark Santorini - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Perivolos Beach - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Antoniou Winery - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Osho Santorini - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Eros Beach - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Perissa Beach - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Museum of Minerals and Fossils - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Vlychada Beach - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Ancient Thira - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Santo Winery - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Wine Museum - 3.2 km / 2 mi

The preferred airport for Insolito Villa is Thira (JTR-Santorini National) - 5.4 km / 3.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
